The innovative #FloodDefence system will safeguard thousands of local homes and businesses.

tweets.text:
Don't drive through flood water!  
1. Just 30cm can float an average family-sized car 
2. It's the #1 cause of death during flooding 
3. Over ¬æ of cars rescued from floods have to be written off 
4. Just 1 egg-cup of water sucked into your engine will wreck it
@SurreyCouncil https://t.co/akYyRv35XV

@emmas_nicol @CleanIlkley There are loads of private septic tanks still discharging directly into watercourses despite new regulations. The @EnvAgency doesn't do anything about those. There is a very long way to go to end this type of pollution.

Today is my last working day at the @EnvAgency after 25 years. Thanks for all the memories and friends I‚Äôve made along the way.

Bring on the new year, new organisation, and new job.

Committee chairwoman Meg Hillier said 
‚Äúthere was NO SIGN OF PROMISED IMPROVEMENTS TO AIR AND WATER QUALITY ‚Äì MUCH LESS A SERIOUS PLAN TO HALT ENVIRONMENTAL DESTRUCTION‚Äù.

Still lots of High Volume Pumps in use to manage levels in the #Hull catchments of the @EnvAgencyYNE patch tonight. We continue to mobilise & refuel pumps. Our assets work hard and occasionally pay the price with breakdowns & so when this happens we work to bring in replacement. https://t.co/8E3lPKOu3L
@JoKingDevon @EnvAgencySW @EnvAgency It‚Äôs a start at least. Perhaps the wire mesh will help ? It‚Äôs a very challenging location.

(Thread) This is terrifying. The London Resort at Swanscombe is in fact part of a much larger masterplan, designed to "maximise the benefits, potential and opportunities of the Thames" & "deliver green economic growth for the area, and for the country" https://t.co/xsm4rXCsLB

@ngterry5 @ACarpenDigital @Cambswater @cllrkatie @camcitco @AnglianWater @EnvAgency And before they try to tell you they can supply through reduced leakage, demand management and license trading, see the NAO report.

Surface water #flooding is possible in parts of northern and central England due to rain falling on saturated ground.

Stay safe and don‚Äôt walk or drive through flood water. 

For guidance on #SurfaceWaterFlooding in your area, contact your local authority. 

#PrepareActSurvive https://t.co/GUyF4cRfLT

Parkgate Rd took a real hit last week & it will be some time before some of my neighbours can return to their flooded homes. Huge shout out to @Go_CheshireWest, @CheshireFire @cheshirepolice etc for all their support. We just need @EnvAgencyNW to sort out the Highfield Drain now. https://t.co/V54fOFFEaz https://t.co/X2Zr9eyATR

@mchapmanallen @EarthlyIdeas @BurnhamDeepdale @nationaltrust @EnvAgencyAnglia @AndrewDJamieson @WestNorfolkBC We are doing all we can to help all of our customers going through these types of issues being brought about by the sheer volume of rainwater over the past two months. I am sorry about this. We will be there as soon as we can

Spent my evening learning about how @CleanIlkley worked to get designated bathing status, so insightful! It‚Äôs time to #EndSewagePollution and have safe, clean rivers for both humans and wildlife üôå

@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency Sewage pollution that eventually enters our water supply.
